activities: House Party creates and manages promotional events for third-party sponsors, for example, to introduce new products to consumers.  Consumers choose to participate by applying to host a promotional event (using functionality provided on the House Party Web site) or by accepting  an  invitation  from a host.  Hosts may invite guests and guests may accept invitations using functionality provided on the House Party Web site.  The promotional event itself takes place offline.  Hosts and other registered users may post user-generated content (for example, comments regarding the promotional event) on event pages hosted on the House Party Web site.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
